mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Parmelee, David L. (David Lewis), 1795-1865
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On July 20 and Oct. 17, 1807, wrote to Hon. A. Gallatin respecting his removal from office of land commissioner in western district of territory of Orleans; enclosed several letters; Gallatin had recommended his appointment; wishes to know why he was removed from office of land commissioner at Opelousas; had served satisfactorily in Mississippi Territory.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gallatin, Albert, 1761-1849
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 November 12, Litchfield, [Connecticut] to Thomas Jefferson, Washington [D.C.].
